                    background-color: #3d77a7
                }
  
   .covid-modal__modal {
    max-width: 665px;
    background-color: #ffffff;
}

.covid-modal__content {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 20px;
}

.covid-modal__close-btn {
    background-color: transparent;
    padding: 0;
    position: absolute;
    right: 22px;
    top: 22px;
}

html .covid-modal__modal .covid-modal__close-icon {
    background-size: 15px;
}

.covid-modal__icon-list {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    justify-content: center;
    margin: 40px auto;
    max-width: 363px;
}

.covid-modal__icon-item {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: center;
    margin: 10px 0 20px;
    font-size: 12px;
    line-height: 14px;
    text-align: center;
    flex: 0 0 33%;
}

.covid-modal__icon {
    margin: 0;
}

.covid-modal__icon-text {
    margin-top: 6px;
    font-weight: normal;
    max-width: 110px;
}

.covid-modal .covid-modal__header {
    color: #171c20;
    font-size: 24px;
    font-weight: bold;
    letter-spacing: normal;
    line-height: normal;
    margin: 0 50px 11px 0;
    padding: 0;
}

.covid-modal__msg {
    color: #171c20;
    font-size: 16px;
    font-weight: normal;
    line-height: 1.25;
}

.covid-modal__btn-bar {
    margin: 14px 0;
    text-align: center;
}

.covid-modal__btn--cta {
    text-transform: uppercase;
    background: #FF7300;
    width: 100%;
}

html body .covid-modal__btn--cta:hover {
    color: #fff;
}

.covid-modal__got-it-link {
    background-color: transparent;
    padding: 0;
    color: #3478C1;
    font-weight: bold;
}

    .covid-modal__content {
        padding: 20px 0;
        width: 363px;
        text-align: center;
    }

        margin-right: 0;
    }
